title: (x) Willem Ruys poster - (similar to) Nobel {HÃ©ctor}
content:
It is very close to DTL Nobel, but of course not matching. How old is this?   
   
 [http://www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/NobelBold.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515203721/http:/www.dutchtypelibrary.nl/NobelBold.html)
author: rs_donsata

comments.content: I don't know if this is much of a help but it seems to be similar to the sans discussed in [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20050515203721/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/70471.html?1114144942).
Yeah, Nobel is the big tease.
